snippet: President François Hollande of France inaugurated the first regional branch of the Louvre on Tuesday, a museum set atop a former coal mining yard in the depressed, postindustrial city of Lens.
abstract: President François Hollande of France inaugurated the first regional branch of the Louvre on Tuesday, a museum set atop a former coal mining yard in the depressed, postindustrial city of Lens.
lead_paragraph: President François Hollande of France inaugurated the first regional branch of the Louvre on Tuesday, a museum set atop a former coal mining yard in the depressed, postindustrial city of Lens.
